com.espertech.esper.eeutil.client.metric

Class MetricClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.eeutil.client.metric.MetricClient

  • public class MetricClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Metric services API for metric reporting including for memory use reporting.

    Note that metric and memory use reporting requires memory for the report to be created and may therefore contribute to an out-of-memory issue. By default, the level of reporting is summarized therefore there should not be an issue unless reporting for a large number of statements or context partitions.

    Note that metric reporting locks each context partition (or the statement when not using contexts). Thereby repeated measurements can reduce throughput.

    Please refer to the documentation for additional documentation.

    TO enable memory measurements, the following argument to the Java application to instrument has to be given: -javaagent:/path/to/esper-eeutilagent-.jar
